alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clinton; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 07 at 5:31AM EST until March 07 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM EST FOR NORTH CENTRAL BROWN...SOUTHERN CLINTON AND NORTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES... At 530 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchester, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Blanchester, Lynchburg, New Vienna, Russell, Martinsville, Midland, St. Martin, Westboro, Cuba, Morrisville and Lake Lorelei. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
